entry.title: Combined summary - rfc using payment_hash fields txn vs the others
entry.summary: A Lightning Network developer has questioned the payment_hash field layout in the Lightning Network BOLT specification. The developer asked why the donation payment_hash txn field layout is different in the second lines stanza and proposed using a code like 0x20 to indicate no bc value in txn instead of the current setup. This change could simplify optimizing for any sort of deep inspection. The developer provided an example of how other fields in the specification are laid out and suggested simplifying the format for none_bc_value. The message ends with the abbreviation "lnbc."
